name: Wind Ryder
description:
Join our dashing hero, Ryder, as he teams up with three fabulous ladies to save the world from the reawakened astral goddess. Enter the fantasy, magical world of Wind Ryder and explore the town of Fallhorn, its nearby forests and destinations, and an academy which trains would-be heroes.


  • Meet the stunning and fearless huntress, Anabelle Wind, whose arrows never miss their mark! With her sharp aim and even sharper wit, she'll keep you entertained while taking down enemies!
  • Next, we have the captivating mage, Arwen Pryor, whose magical prowess is as mesmerizing as her looks! Watch as she unleashes powerful spells and freezes her enemies with a sultry smile!
  • And let's not forget the elegant elven sword master, Prim Moonstar, who dances through battle like a graceful whirlwind! Prepare to be amazed by her lethal swordplay and her unexpected love for cheesy puns!


  • A romantic comedy adventure with a hero and 3 heroines.
  • Funny banters with laugh-out-loud moments.
  • Fast, turn-based battle system. No grinding needed.
  • Custom anime art.
  • Breathtaking soundtrack.
  • Attraction system to build bond with heroines.
  • Quest journal to guide you.
  • Talent system and different talents to unlock for each character.
  • Forging system for upgrading weapons.
  • Immersive side-quests and a character-driven story.
  • Total playtime: 2-5 hours.


Together, this dynamic quartet will battle through treacherous dungeons, face hordes of monstrous foes, and unravel the secrets of the astral goddess! But be prepared for more than just saving the world! With hilarious banter, playful rivalries, and unexpected romances, this game is guaranteed to keep you laughing and swooning!

Are you prepared to soar through the skies, save the world, and maybe even find love along the way?

Wind Ryder. Get ready for an adventure that will blow you away!
